Reviews.Title: its been working really good
Reviews.Author: Samara Riviera
Reviews.Content: had some issues with iphoto at first but now everything is working perfectly. I love my new mac. thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: Perfect computer
Reviews.Author: Daryl S Zoulko
Reviews.Content: This computer does everything that I had expected it to do.  And it's easy to use . I would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Wasn't what I expected
Reviews.Author: Rodney D Jahnke
Reviews.Content: I was wanting to try out the Mac computers and see what all the hype was about. I thought this would be a good little intro computer and though it works I was disappointed with it on the overall. Web pages are slow, there was no iphoto or imovie, very bare bones. The lack of a card reader and not picking up my iphone were also disappointing.I haven't given up on apple but really prefer the windows at least in comparison to this computer.
